materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Singapore from the harbour. The foreground of the photograph shows the sea, with the coast running from the right. In the distance, there is a bridge, and several buildings and building structures. On the left of the photograph, in the distance, there are some ships and boats near the habour. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Singapore from the Harbour
